name: Cobar
description:
• Click on the options.
  • M to mute sound.
  • Live with your decisions.

Ah, life at sea. Full of promise and adventure. What shall this day bring to our crew? What happens when we all have different ideas of what constitutes a healthy society, yet we're trapped together on a boat and can't escape each other?

Cobar is a parody/demake of the upcoming My little humanity by Santiago Franzani.
